title: Average age of players in Major League Baseball by club 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Major League Baseball Player in the x axis and Average player age in years in the y axis.
The Average player age in years is highest at Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals and lowest at Major League Baseball Player Baltimore Orioles.
The minimum Major League Baseball Player Baltimore Orioles has got 1.17 times less Average player age in years than the maximum Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals.
